name: technician

effect.scarlet-violet: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.
effect.the-teal-mask: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.
effect.the-indigo-disk: struggle is unaffected. helping hand and defense curl are not taken into account.

short_effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: Powers up weak moves so the Pokémon can deal more damage with them.
